name: Samuel A. WILSON, v. PHILADELPHIA HOUSING AUTHORITY, Appellant, and Rasheeda Abdual-Haqq

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: Samuel A. WILSON, v. PHILADELPHIA HOUSING AUTHORITY, Appellant, and Rasheeda Abdual-Haqq.

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM:
ORDER
Order of Commonwealth Court reversed. See LeFlar v. Gulf Creek Industrial Park, 511 Pa. 574, 515 A.2d 875 (1986).
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Thomas P. Grace, James M. Marsh, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Arnold H. Winicov, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
536 A.2d 337
Samuel A. WILSON, v. PHILADELPHIA HOUSING AUTHORITY, Appellant, and Rasheeda Abdual-Haqq.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1987.
Decided Jan. 19, 1988.
Thomas P. Grace, James M. Marsh, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Arnold H. Winicov, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
